name: Pac (Wullie)
description:
Play as a ghost from Pac-Man and eat all the dots before the terrifying Pac eats you!

I made this game for a Game Jam my Game Development University program hosted where the theme was "What's old is new". My fiancée suggested I do Pac-Man in 3D, after which I got the idea of playing as a Pac-Man ghost being hunted by Pac-Man.

The Game Jam lasted for four days and I spent a total of 18 hours and 20 minutes on my game before the presentation. After the Game Jam was over I did some minor tweaks and created a couple of scenes for the images now being used.
